```{r setup}
install.packages("tidyverse")
```

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```


```{r}
data <- read_csv("dataset.csv")
head(data)
```


```{r}
summary(data)
```


```{r}
# cleaning
data <- data |> drop_na(popularity)

nrow(data)
```

```{r}
names(data)
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data, aes(liveness, popularity)) + geom_point()
```
